sentences.en: "I'm Nancy Drew," she said, holding out her hand.
sentences.cn: “我是南希·德鲁，”她伸出手来说。

sentences.en: "Mr Cummings is here," she said, holding the door open.
sentences.cn: “卡明斯先生来了，”她把门敞着说道。

sentences.en: A garden is, at best, a holding operation against nature.
sentences.cn: 花园充其量不过是抗拒自然的一时之法。

sentences.en: Gucci will be holding fashion shows to present their autumn collection.
sentences.cn: 古奇将举办时装发布会推出他们的秋装系列。

sentences.en: He said earlier that he is not holding out a begging bowl.
sentences.cn: 他早先说他不会伸手去乞求援助。

sentences.en: He was holding a cloth that dripped pink drops upon the floor.
sentences.cn: 他正拿着一块布，布上粉红色的水滴落在地板上。

sentences.en: Mills have iron pillars all over the place holding up the roof.
sentences.cn: 工厂里四处都立有铁柱支撑着房顶。

sentences.en: One prisoner was still holding out on the roof of the jail.
sentences.cn: 一名犯人仍在监狱的房顶上顽抗。

sentences.en: OPEC production is holding at around 21.5 million barrels a day.
sentences.cn: 石油输出国组织的石油产量保持在每天约2,150万桶。

sentences.en: She climbed the staircase cautiously, holding fast to the rail.
sentences.cn: 她紧紧地抓着栏杆，小心翼翼地爬楼梯。

sentences.en: She was holding onto the rail to keep her balance.
sentences.cn: 她抓住扶手以保持平衡。

sentences.en: Stagnation in home sales is holding back economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 国内销售的停滞不前正阻碍着经济复苏。

sentences.en: That would increase Olympia & York's holding to 35%.
sentences.cn: 那样就会使奥林匹亚约克公司的股份上升到35%。

sentences.en: The Foundation is holding a dinner in honour of something or other.
sentences.cn: 基金会正举办某个纪念宴会。

sentences.en: There, directly below me, was a guy holding the ball.
sentences.cn: 刚好就在我下方，有个家伙手里拿着那个球。

words.tran_cn: 持有人；所有人；固定器；（台、架等）支持物
持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制

phrases.tran_cn: 银行持股公司，银行控股公司
冒充；表现不真实的关系
持有期间；置存期；保持时间
接受器；储料囤；存储器；收集器

trans.tran_cn: 佃户租种的土地，所有物（如土地、债券、股份等），私有财产，（因其热情、精力或决心等）阻拦不住某人
拿( hold的现在分词)，认为，包含，容纳
